messages.text: I guess this means you're using my app‚Ä¶
So, my name is Pat. I made this app to tell you a little about myself, and show you some things I've built.
What would you like to know about first?

messages.help_text: By the way, if you need help or to restart, use the settings cog at the top left ‚Üñ ‚öô

messages.text: This is me on Christmas day last year down at the beach.

responses.title: Nice photo!
responses.text: Nice photo! So, where do you go to school? üéì

responses.title: Is that a halo behind you?
responses.text: Is that a halo behind you? üòú Anyway, where do you go to school? üéì

messages.text: I'm a full-time student at the University of Technology, Sydney studying a combined Bachelor of Business, Bachelor of Computing.

messages.help_text: FYI, press with different levels of force to fly around the map!

messages.text: I'm majoring in Marketing (for the Business) and Programming (for the Computing).
You probably could've guessed the programming part üòú
I've recently turned 21 and have completed two and half years of my four year degree.

responses.title: Where are you from?
responses.text: I see you go to UTS, are you originally from Sydney?

messages.text: I'm born and raised in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney, Australia.
